root: ^Looks like a black hole formed near one of your customer's houses. Our darn radars didn't pick it up until after it was already there.
^Thankfully the customer is still there. Their home is equipped with space stablizers so they're sitting comfy, ready and waiting for their plant orders.
^Yes, you still have to deliver packages to 'em, but don't worry. If you get sucked in, your teleporter device will pull you right out safe and sound.
